item.title: First Post
item.description:
This is a first post. To print in Python, do print("Hello") Write math: $$ L=\sum_{(u,v)\in D} \log {\exp(-d(u,v))} $$ $$ \left\{  egin{cases} \dot{x} & = \sigma(y-x) 
ewline \dot{y} & = ho x - y - xz 
ewline \dot{z} & = - eta z + xy \end{cases} ight. $$ $$ \vec{
abla} 	imes \vec{F} = \left(  rac{\partial F_z}{\partial y} -  rac{\partial F_y}{\partial z} ight) \mathbf{i} + \left(  rac{\partial F_x}{\partial z} -  rac{\partial F_z}{\partial x} ight) \mathbf{j} + \left(  rac{\partial F_y}{\partial x} -  rac{\partial F_x}{\partial y} ight) \mathbf{k} $$
